ingredients.ingredient: 1 (11 ounce) can lychee fruit, drained with juice reserved
1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined
3 Fuji apples - peeled, cored and cubed

cookingTips: Toss apples with lemon juice immediately after cutting to prevent browning
Keep the reserved lychee juice to thin the mayonnaise dressing if needed
Chill the salad for at least 30 minutes before serving for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I balance the sweetness of lychee and apple with the savory shrimp in this refreshing salad?
